entry.answer: The text outlines four varnas with distinct duties: 1) Brahmins (priests) should beg (भैक्षं विप्रतिषिद्धं ते), 2) Kshatriyas (warriors) should protect (क्षत्रियः परिपालयेत्), 3) Vaishyas (merchants) should earn wealth (वैश्यो धनार्जनं कुर्याच्छूद्रः परिचरेच्च तान्), and 4) Shudras (laborers) should serve (शूद्रः परिचरेच्च तान्).
